Pre-Game Insights: India need a win on Thursday to avoid finishing last in the Super 4s
Afghanistan will have to turn up fresh less than 18 hours after their potboiler against Pakistan
Victory by no means is a formality for India
Afghanistan have twice lost games they have been in control of and will have another opportunity to fight jangling nerves to close out games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Surfaces are slowly losing sheen, and it's becoming more helpful for the bowlers, especially if they're prepared to dig it in
Only two of the 19 games have been won by the team batting first since January 2020 here
Weather-wise, it'll continue to remain hot and muggy, although the temperatures have dipped just a touch in the evening
Others: Rohit Sharma and the team management have backed Bhuvneshwar Kumar
Mujeeb Ur Rahman has returned as one of Afghanistan's premier spinners alongside Rashid Khan
Deepak Chahar was officially drafted into the squad on the eve of the game, replacing the ill Avesh Khan
